paper_abstract: Let F be a set of faulty edges in hypercube Q(n) with vertical bar F vertical bar <= 3n - 8 for n >= 5. We prove that there still exists a fault-free Hamiltonian cycle in Q(n) if the following two conditions are satisfied: (1) the degree of every vertex is at least two, and (2) there do not exist a pair of nonadjacent vertices in a 4-cycle whose degrees are both two after faulty edges are removed. (C) 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Hamiltonian cycles in hypercubes With faulty edges
